answers.answer: Dear Lady777,You have posted a health related question on the Health Insurance Forum that is designed to help you with health insurance related questions & concerns.Your question sounds more appropriate for the Cardiovascular Disease Prevention Forum.Sincerely,Amir Mostafaie

question: I have taken so many pills for my high blood pressure, i.e., Atenolol, Diovan, Lisinopril, Felodipine, Adalat, etc.  What is the best medication in this condition?  I also have diabetes, but my medications I am taking so far is OK.
title: high blood pressure
